item.title: 贝恩资本正洽谈以 100 亿美元估值收购 PCI 制药公司
item.description: 知情人士透露，贝恩资本正在洽谈收购 PCI Pharma Services，这笔交易将成为今年最大的私募股权收购交易之一。【原文：Bain Capital is in talks to buy PCI Pharma Services, people with knowledge of the matter said, in a deal that would rank among the year’s largest private equity takeovers.】

item.title: 欧佩克同意大幅增加石油供应，对冲基金看淡石油市场
item.description: 由于欧佩克+同意第二次大幅增产，加剧了对额外供应可能导致全球供应过剩的担忧，对冲基金转而看涨布伦特原油，这是大约六个月来最不看好布伦特原油的一次。【原文：Hedge funds turned the least bullish on Brent crude in about six months as OPEC+ agreed to a second major production increase, inflaming concerns that the extra supply could lead to a global glut.】

item.title: 高盛将关闭 ETF 加速器，将服务转向 Tidal
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. 将关闭其 ETF Accelerator 平台，该平台帮助资产管理公司发行、上市和监督交易所交易基金，并将为容纳约 50 亿美元产品的信托基金提供服务的责任移交给潮汐金融集团（Tidal Financial Group）。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. will wind down its ETF Accelerator platform that helped asset managers launch, list and oversee exchange-traded funds, transferring servicing responsibilities for trusts that house about $5 billion of the products to Tidal Financial Group.】

item.title: Coinbase 考虑并决定反对迈克尔-赛勒的比特币购买策略
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.过去曾受到诱惑，想全面采用迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）推广的比特币购买策略，但认为该计划风险太大。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. was tempted in the past to go all in on the Bitcoin buying strategy popularized by Michael Saylor but considered the scheme too risky.】

item.title: 前 Palantir 顾问将在特朗普的职位上保留 SpaceX 和 OpenAI 的股份
item.description: Palantir 科技公司前顾问雅各布-赫尔伯格（Jacob Helberg）在开始担任唐纳德-特朗普政府的副国务卿时，计划保留对数十家人工智能、国防和金融科技公司的投资。【原文：Former Palantir Technologies Inc. adviser Jacob Helberg plans to retain investments in dozens of artificial intelligence, defense and fintech companies as he starts his tenure as an under secretary of state in Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 被解雇的布鲁克菲尔德风险投资公司负责人称公司要求他向投资者撒谎
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）风险投资部门的前负责人指控该公司在他拒绝向投资者撒谎后错误地解雇了他。【原文：The former head of Brookfield Asset Management’s venture capital arm accused the firm of wrongfully firing him after he refused to lie to investors.】

item.title: 加纳债务负担因经济扩张而大幅下降
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）表示，随着经济的扩张和政府在债务危机后控制支出，加纳的债务负担将在今年大幅减轻。【原文：Ghana’s debt burden will ease sharply this year as the economy expands and the government reins in spending after a debt crisis, Barclays Plc said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织不顾印度反对批准向巴基斯坦支付 10 亿美元
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）执行董事会周五批准向巴基斯坦发放约 10 亿美元的贷款，在该国与邻国印度的冲突不断恶化的情况下，缓解了该国脆弱的财政状况。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board on Friday approved a roughly $1 billion loan disbursements to Pakistan, bringing some relief for the nation’s fragile finances amid its worsening conflict with neighboring India.】

item.title: 沃什认为美联储关税言论暗示信誉受损

item.title: 美国最大电网警告：极端高温将带来夏季电力短缺风险
item.description: 从中西部到东海岸为约 20% 的美国人提供服务的美国最大电网 PJM Interconnection LLC 警告说，今年夏天的极端高温可能会首次引发供应短缺。【原文：PJM Interconnection LLC, the largest US electric grid serving about 20% of Americans from the Midwest to East Coast, warned that extreme heat this summer could trigger supply shortages for the first time.】

item.title: Whoop 因向现有用户收取新机型升级费而面临反弹

item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普升级与中国的关税战，对从中国进口的商品征收高额关税之后，世界最大贸易关系之一的未来岌岌可危。【原文：The future of one of the world’s biggest trading relationships hangs in the balance after US President Donald Trump escalated the tariff war with China by imposing steep duties on imports from the country.】

item.title: CaixaBank 探索与孤星银行旗下 Novo Banco 的交易

item.title: 破产的联邦承包商寻求快速出售以规避能源管理总局的威胁
item.description: 本周早些时候，一家联邦承包商在最新一轮政府裁员中申请破产，要求法官批准快速拍卖，因为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "政府效率部"（Department of Government Efficiency）正在构成威胁。【原文：A federal contractor that filed bankruptcy earlier this week during the latest round of government cutbacks asked a judge to approve a quick auction because of the ongoing threat of Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency.】

item.title: Stellantis 接近首席执行官人选，美国老板成为最大竞争者
